# Interface EmbeddingMatcherConfigInterface

Interface for configuring embedding-based intent matching.

interface EmbeddingMatcherConfigInterface {  
similarityThreshold: number;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

similarityThreshold

## Properties

### similarityThreshold

similarityThreshold: number

Threshold for similarity scores when matching intents (0-1, higher means more strict matching)

### Settings

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
